00062     /***
00063      * Registers an action as a REST action
00064      * @param string $actionName
00065      * @param string $method
00066      * @param mixed $access
00067      */
00068     public function addRestAction( $actionName, $method = 'GET', $access = CPSCRUDController::ACCESS_TO_AUTH )
00069     {
00070         $this->_restActions[ $actionName ] = array(
00071             'method' => $method,
00072             'access' => $access,
00073         );
00074     }

00082     public function hasAction( $actionName, $method = 'GET' )
00083     {
00084         if ( $_action = CPSHelperBase::o( $this->_restActions, $actionName ) )
00085             return ( CPSHelperBase::o( $this->_restActions[$actionName], 'method' ) == $method );
00086 
00087         return false;
00088     }

00098     public function createAction( $sActionId )
00099     {
00100         $_sActionId = ( $sActionId === '' ) ? $this->getOwner()->defaultAction : $sActionId;
00101 
00102         //  Is it a valid request?
00103         if ( ! method_exists( $this->getOwner(), 'get' . $_sActionId ) && ! method_exists( $this->getOwner(), 'post' . $_sActionId ) && ! method_exists( $this->getOwner(), 'request' . $_sActionId ) )
00104             return $this->getOwner()->missingAction( $_sActionId );
00105 
00106         return new CPSRESTAction( $this->getOwner(), $_sActionId );
00107     }
00108

00123     protected function dispatchRequest( CAction $oAction )
00124     {
00125         $_sActionId = $oAction->getId();
00126         $_arParams = $_REQUEST;
00127         $_arUrlParams = array();
00128         $_arOpts = array();
00129 
00130         //  If additional parameters are specified in the URL, convert to parameters...
00131         $_sUri = Yii::app()->getRequest()->getRequestUri();
00132 
00133         if ( null != ( $_sUri = trim( str_ireplace( '/' . $this->getOwner()->getId() . '/' . $_sActionId, '', $_sUri ) ) ) )
00134         {
00135             $_sUri = trim( $_sUri, '/?' );
00136             $_arOpts = ( ! empty( $_sUri ) ? explode( '/', $_sUri ) : array() );
00137 
00138             foreach ( $_arOpts as $_sKey => $_oValue )
00139             {
00140                 if ( false !== strpos( $_oValue, '=' ) )
00141                 {
00142                     if ( null != ( $_arTemp = explode( '=', $_oValue ) ) )
00143                         $_arOpts[ $_arTemp[0] ] = $_arTemp[1];
00144 
00145                     unset( $_arOpts[ $_sKey ] );
00146                 }
00147                 else
00148                     $_arOpts[ $_sKey ] = $_oValue;
00149             }
00150         }
00151 
00152         //  Any query string? (?x=y&...)
00153         if ( null != ( $_sQuery = parse_url( $_sUri, PHP_URL_QUERY ) ) )
00154             $_arOpts = array_merge( explode( '=', $_sQuery ), $_arOpts );
00155 
00156         //  load into url params
00157         foreach ( $_arOpts as $_sKey => $_sValue )
00158             if ( ! isset( $_arUrlParams[ $_sKey ] ) ) $_arUrlParams[ $_sKey ] = $_sValue;
00159 
00160         //  Is it a valid request?
00161         $_sType = strtolower( $this->getOwner()->getRequest()->getRequestType() );
00162         $_sMethod = $_sType . ucfirst( $_sActionId );
00163 
00164         if ( $_sType == 'post' )
00165         {
00166             foreach ( $_POST as $_sKey => $_oValue )
00167             {
00168                 if ( ! is_array( $_oValue ) )
00169                     $_arUrlParams[ $_sKey ] = $_oValue;
00170                 else
00171                 {
00172                     foreach ( $_oValue as $_sSubKey => $_oSubValue )
00173                         $_arUrlParams[ $_sSubKey ] = $_oSubValue;
00174                 }
00175             }
00176         }
00177 
00178         if ( ! method_exists( $this->getOwner(), $_sMethod ) )
00179         {
00180             //  Is it a valid catchall request?
00181             if ( ! method_exists( $this->getOwner(), 'request' . $_sActionId ) )
00182                 //  No clue what it is, so must be bogus. Hand off to missing action...
00183                 return $this->getOwner()->missingAction( $_sActionId );
00184 
00185             $_sMethod = 'request' . $_sActionId;
00186         }
00187 
00188         //  All rest methods echo their output
00189         echo call_user_func_array( array( $this->getOwner(), $_sMethod ), array_values( $_arUrlParams ) );
00190     }
